data.title: Henry George Columbo, Jr. Obituary 2012
data.meta_description: NAME:  Henry G Columbo, Jr.      AGE:  66  CITY OF RESIDENCE:  Underwood IN    DATE & PLACE OF DEATH:  October 8 2012, Underwood IN  DATE & PLACE OF BIRTH:  September 15 1946, C...
data.text:
NAME: Henry G Columbo, Jr.

AGE: 66

CITY OF RESIDENCE: Underwood IN

DATE & PLACE OF DEATH: October 8 2012, Underwood IN

DATE & PLACE OF BIRTH: September 15 1946, Conway SC

OCCUPATION: carpet & floor installer

MEMBERSHIPS: past member of American Legion #234

VETERAN: served in Viet Nam with the U. S. Marine Corps

PARENTS: Henry G Columbo Sr., & Ruby S Shelley Columbo

MARRIAGE: Joyce D Seafert Columbo

SURVIVORS: Wife: Joyce Columbo, Underwood IN

Sons: Anthony Michael Columbo, Colon MI

Nicholas Columbo (Wendy Sparks), New Albany IN

Jon Columbo (Amanda Dillo), Underwood IN

Daughter: Kristie Boals (Thad), Colon MI

Brother: John Russ Columbo (Beverly), Munster IN

Sisters: Judy Pharr (Alvin), Vina AL

Shelley Fisher, Vina AL

5 grandchildren & 4 step grandchildren

Preceded in death by: his parents; brothers Billy Brown & Jackie Shelley, a sister Barbara Schoenbacher

VISITATION: 4 PM - 8 PM Thursday October 11 2012

& Noon - 1 PM Friday October 12 2012

Stewart & Hoagland Funeral Home

FUNERAL SERVICE: 1 PM Friday October 12 2012

Stewart & Hoagland Funeral Home

OFFICIATING: Roger Fenner

BURIAL: Indiana Veterans Memorial Cemetery, Madison IN

SPECIAL SERVICE; Military Graveside Service at IVMC, Madison IN

MEMORIAL DONATIONS: to the family

c/o Stewart & Hoagland Funeral Home, 80 N 1st St, Scottsburg In 47170

Visitation

2012-10-11 16:00:00

20:00:00

Funeral Home
